data.lyric:
[ti:Cry Pretty]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:Cry Pretty]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Cry Pretty - Carrie Underwood (凯莉·安德伍德)
[00:02.37]Written by：Carrie Underwood/Lori McKenna/Liz Rose/Hillary Lindsey
[00:04.75]I'm sorry
[00:06.48]
[00:07.75]But I'm just a girl
[00:09.86]Not usually the kind to show my heart to the world
[00:14.96]I'm pretty good at keeping it together
[00:19.83]
[00:20.47]I hold my composure for worse or for better
[00:24.98]So I apologize
[00:27.76]If you don't like what you see
[00:30.38]But sometimes my emotions get the best of me
[00:35.63]And falling apart is as human as it gets
[00:40.58]You can't hide it
[00:41.96]You can't fight
[00:43.17]But the truth is
[00:44.74]
[00:45.45]You can pretty lie
[00:48.13]
[00:48.66]And say it's okay
[00:50.65]You can pretty smile
[00:53.23]
[00:53.89]And just walk away
[00:55.88]Pretty much fake your way through anything
[01:00.90]But you can't cry pretty
[01:08.65]
[01:10.46]Oh no you can't dress it up in lace or rhinestones
[01:16.49]Don't matter if you're in a crowd or home alone
[01:21.83]Yeah it's all the same when you're looking in the mirror
[01:26.70]
[01:27.30]A pinch or a pain
[01:29.51]So let it flow like a river
[01:32.03]You can pretty lie
[01:34.44]
[01:35.02]And say it's okay
[01:36.90]You can pretty smile
[01:39.49]
[01:40.14]And just walk away
[01:42.06]Pretty much fake your way through anything
[01:47.16]But you can't cry pretty
[01:52.24]You can't turn off the flood when the dam breaks
[01:57.92]When all your mascara is going to waste
[02:02.85]When things get ugly
[02:05.14]
[02:05.83]You just got to face that you can't cry pretty
[02:17.62]
[02:18.16]Oh no you can't
[02:19.68]
[02:33.34]You can't turn off the flood when the dam breaks
[02:39.30]When all your mascara is going to waste
[02:44.24]When things get ugly
[02:46.29]
[02:47.06]You just got to face that you can't cry pretty
[02:56.89]
[03:03.08]No you can't cry
[03:05.46]No you can't cry
[03:08.65]
[03:23.64]No no no no no no no
[03:24.92]No no no no no no no
[03:27.51]
[03:31.36]You can't cry
[03:33.78]You can't cry pretty baby
[03:36.34]
[03:36.92]Oh yeah
[03:37.76]
[03:50.48]No you can't cry pretty
data.trans:
[ti:Cry Pretty]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:Cry Pretty]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.45]//
[00:04.91]我很抱歉
[00:06.64]
[00:07.91]但我只是一个普通女孩
[00:10.02]不轻易将自己的内心展示给旁人
[00:15.12]我很擅长隐藏心事
[00:19.99]
[00:20.63]无论好坏 我都能淡然自若
[00:25.14]所以我很抱歉
[00:27.92]如果对你的所见并不满意
[00:30.54]但有时 我都只展现那些积极的情绪
[00:35.79]但和他人一样 我也会有伤心难过的时候
[00:40.74]你无法隐藏
[00:42.12]也无力抗争
[00:43.33]真相就是
[00:44.90]
[00:45.61]你的谎言也许很完美
[00:48.29]
[00:48.82]说着无碍
[00:50.81]笑容完美
[00:53.39]
[00:54.05]然后离去
[00:56.04]你将自己的一切都包装的非常完美
[01:01.06]但你哭泣时 一定不那么完美
[01:08.81]
[01:10.62]你无法用蕾丝或者水晶来装饰
[01:16.65]无论是身处人群之中 或是独自在家
[01:21.99]镜中的你都一样
[01:26.86]
[01:27.46]幸福或痛苦
[01:29.67]就像流水般逝去吧
[01:32.19]你的谎言也许很完美
[01:34.60]
[01:35.18]说着无碍
[01:37.06]笑容完美
[01:39.65]
[01:40.30]然后离去
[01:42.22]你将自己的一切都包装的非常完美
[01:47.32]但你哭泣时 一定不那么完美
[01:52.40]大坝倒塌时 你无法阻止洪水泛滥
[01:58.08]当睫毛膏也无济于事
[02:03.01]当一切都变的丑陋
[02:05.30]
[02:05.99]你不得不面对现实 哭泣时无法完美
[02:17.78]
[02:18.32]你无法做到
[02:19.84]
[02:33.50]大坝倒塌时 你无法阻止洪水泛滥
[02:39.46]当睫毛膏也无济于事
[02:44.40]当一切都变的丑陋
[02:46.45]
[02:47.22]你不得不面对现实 哭泣时无法完美
[02:57.05]
[03:03.24]不 你不能哭泣
[03:05.62]不 你不能哭泣
[03:08.81]
[03:23.80]不不不不
[03:25.08]不不不不
[03:27.67]
[03:31.52]你不能哭泣
[03:33.94]你无法哭的漂亮
[03:36.50]
[03:37.08]是的
[03:37.92]
[03:50.64]你无法哭的漂亮
